name: AIRHEART - The Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
It's the Soundtrack of AIRHEART - Tales of broken Wings, in "224kbps MP3's" format. Six Tracks in a beautiful 10 Minutes EP soundscape.

Like the game, this Soundtrack will be updated as the game grows in Early Access.

If you like the Music of Airheart, please consider getting the OST to and directly support Pocket Universe Productions for their fantastic work.

Tracklist:

1. Main Menu (1:05)
2. Amelia's Workshop (1:22)
3. Cherry Blossom (4:01)
4. Autumn Forest (5:15)
5. A New Start (4:06)
6. Above the Blossom Tree (4:06)

Please Note: once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.
